text: @NYGovCuomo Do your part & STOP putting #COVID19 patients in nursing homes! YOU are directly responsible for 1000’s of deaths in #NewYork!Shame on you!#DemocratsLiedAndPeopleDied  tell @NYCMayor he is also responsible for the deaths!! U both should RESIGN in disgrace! https://t.co/632EHSpypU https://t.co/DVc9Dn82nG
